a) kanthankudi pradeshaye jiwath wana janathawata wiwidha awasthawala ella karana lada tharjana saha prahara sambandhayen 2019 aprel masa 21 wana dina bomba pupurawagena miya giya saharan hashim saha 2019 aprel masa 26 wana dina sayindamaruduhi di bomba pupuruwagena miya giya ee el em niyas yana ayawalunta erehiwa adhikaranaya wisin warenthu nikuth kara thibiya di saha eki warenthukaruwan kanthankudi pradeshaye prasiddhawa wiwidha kriyakarakamwala yedi sitiya di owun athadanguwata ganimata ho nisi lesa nithiya kriyathmaka kirimata apohosath wima.

apa kathawe gurunnanseta pasugiya dina kihipayema noyek wada rajakari yedi thibuni.awiweki bawa nisa aduma tharamin sathi dekakin pamana na ganimatada nohaki wiya.thama abalan niwase idiripasa thibu abalan putuwe wadi wu gurunnanse thama kunupiri hisa kasamin idiripasa kadulla desa bala siti.hisa kasana wita hise thattu washayen badi athi kunu siyalla ohuge niyawalata guliwi ambaari yayi.ee siyalla praweshamen hisin ragena putu ande alawamin ada dinaye kumak karamdo yanuwen kalpana karamin sitina gurunnanseta thama niwesa desata yam kisiwaku ena bawa penina.thama dina kihipayakata pera baragath karya ohuta sihipath wuye thama niwasata paminena tharunaya dutu mohotheya.tharunaya enne yanthraya ragena yame balaporoththuweni.dewalaye thibu yanthrada awasan wi atha.dan kalahaki wenayamakda natha.me atharathure guruge niwasata pamini tharunaya guruta wada pasekin thibu kuda putuwaka hida gaththeya....

owun wisin madhya ha samipa sabandathawak athi kara yahapath gunathmaka wadasatahan wikashayata katayuthu kirimata uthsaha daranu labe.sambuddhathwa jayanthi wadasatahan yanu bauddhayan udesa pamanakma sakas kala, bauddhayan udesa pamanakma, kriyathmaka wana wadasatahan nowe.
ee madiwata ethana inna eka ekalage aadambarakan balannath oona !

“oba dewita dun poronduwata wishwasawantha wemin+ rajuge niyogaya pawathwanna.+ 3 ohu wethin iwathwa yamata ikman nowanna.+ waradi kriyawakata sambandha nowanna.+ manda raju yam deyak sithuwoth ohu aniwaryayenma eya itu karagani.+ 4 manda rajuge wachanayata ihalin yanna katawath nohaka.+ ‘oba kumakda me karanne’ kiya ohugen kisiwekuta asiya nohaka.” 5 nithigaruka pudgalayekuta kisi anathurak sidu noweyi.+ emenma yam karanayak sambandhayen piyawara ganimata nisi welawak ha nisi kramayak thibena bawa pragnyawanthawa sithana kenek dani.+ 6 manda sama karanayakma hasirawimata nisi welawak ha nisi kramayak thibe.+ thawada minisata daraganna bari tharamatama boho duk karadara thibe.+ 7 anagathaye kumak sidu weyida kiya kisiwek nodaniyi.+ esenam, idiriyedi kumak weyida kiya pawasiya hakke katada? 8 miya yana mohothedi thama husma pita wi yama walakwimatawath+ marena dawasa kal damimatawath minisekuta balaya natha.+ yuddhayata giya kenekuta satanin iwathwa ya nohaka.+ esema, dushtayekuta thama dushta upayan magin galawimak labagatha nohaka.+ 9 me sama deyakma mama as dekenma dutuwemi.
